author: wn.com
title: Early goals by Malkin, Maata give Penguins enough for 2-1 victory over Maple Leafs (NHL ...
text: ( Source : NHL - National Hockey League ) PITTSBURGH, Pa. - Evgeni Malkin and Olli Maatta scored first-period goals and the Pittsburgh Penguins held on for a 2-1 victory over the Toronto Maple Leafs on Saturday night . Malkin scored his second
